content: 1st Year of College, language that they taught us was Java with few activities and Data Structure.
We still using java and make a project with it, but aside from that I tried to learned Web Development that is where I found FreeCodeCamp.
We use different language like python and learned Operating Systems, BASH, Networking and technoprenuership.
We used arduino for our embedded system subject, and use C for programming it. Also I tried to learn React.js and Tailwind CSS

I become backend developer Intern at MONAD Solutions, my mentor is approachable and kind, I learned a lot from him. And our capstone we use python to program the uniAR: Uniform Fitting Kiosk using Augmented Reality
